snippet: After slipping box-office grosses, “War Horse,” the award-winning hit Broadway play, will close in New York on Jan. 6.
abstract: Lincoln Center Theater announces that its production of the Tony Award-winning play War Horse will close in January 2013 due to high production costs.
lead_paragraph: After slipping box-office grosses, “War Horse,” the award-winning hit Broadway play, will close in New York on Jan. 6.

headline.seo: ‘War Horse’ to Close on Broadway in January
headline.main: ‘War Horse’ Is to Close in January
headline.print_headline: ‘War Horse’ Is to Close In January
